mapper.select: SELECT ppa.* FROM pur_pay_plan_detail pppd left join pur_pay_apply ppa on pppd.pay_apply_id = ppa.id WHERE pppd.del_flag = '0' and pppd.pay_plan_id = #{mainId}

SELECT ppa.project_id, sum( ppad.pay_amount ) AS pay_amount, bm.model FROM pur_pay_plan_detail pppd INNER JOIN pur_pay_plan ppp ON pppd.pay_plan_id = ppp.id INNER JOIN pur_pay_apply ppa ON pppd.pay_apply_id = ppa.id INNER JOIN pur_pay_apply_detail ppad ON ppa.id = ppad.apply_id and ppad.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN contract_object_qty co ON ppad.bill_detail_id = co.id INNER JOIN bas_material bm on co.prod_code = bm.code WHERE pppd.del_flag = '0' AND ppp.pay_status = '2' AND ppa.project_id = #{query.projectId} GROUP BY ppa.project_id, bm.model

select tmp.project_id,tmp.pay_amount,tmp.category_id from ( SELECT ppa.project_id, sum(ppad.pay_amount) AS pay_amount, cb.category_id FROM pur_pay_plan_detail pppd INNER JOIN pur_pay_plan ppp ON pppd.pay_plan_id = ppp.id INNER JOIN pur_pay_apply ppa ON pppd.pay_apply_id = ppa.id INNER JOIN pur_pay_apply_detail ppad ON ppa.id = ppad.apply_id and ppad.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN contract_base cb on ppa.contract_id = cb.id WHERE pppd.del_flag = '0' AND ppp.pay_status = '2' AND ppa.project_id = #{query.projectId} GROUP BY ppa.project_id, cb.category_id union all select pcp.project_id, sum(pcp.pay_amount) as pay_amount, pcp.category_id from project_category_pay pcp where pcp.del_flag = '0' and pcp.type = '1' and pcp.project_id = #{query.projectId} group by pcp.project_id,pcp.category_id ) tmp group by tmp.project_id,tmp.category_id
